body_content.explanation: a single piece of clothing consisting of a top part and trousers worn by babies and very young children:
examples: They had a photo of me as a baby wearing yellow rompers.
The designer unveiled a collection of baby rompers with fur trim.
The baby was wearing a romper suit.

body_content.explanation: a single piece of clothing for adults that consists of a top part joined to short or long trousers :
examples: The new collection includes white and ecru trouser suits, rompers and cowl-necked dresses for the successful working woman.
A romper can be tricky to wear if you don't want to look too young.
How do you go to the loo in an all-in-one romper suit?
